snippet.title: PHD Comics Movie is coming, providing an inside view of science
snippet.description: ...Earlier this year, graduate students suddenly found themselves deprived of a major source of procrastination when updates of the Piled Higher and Deeper (PHD) Comics suddenly reduced to trickles. snippet.title: Tomorrow is Free Comic Book Day, so plan accordingly
snippet.description: ...The first Saturday in May is a glorious day for comic book fans, or anyone who likes to get things for free. You find a participating comic store in your area, you walk in, and you get to grab a few comic books for free. That's it. No strings attached, other than the fact my family tends...
